person.persName: Abner Eversole (Perry County, KY, laborer and soldier (U.S.A.) 14th KY Cav)

body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Eversole and Sallie Bowling Eversole. Resident of Perry County in 1850. Laborer in Perry County in 1860. Served in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private from November 5, 1861 to December 24, 1862. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant from February 13, 1863 to March 24, 1864.
